column4: hi can someone help me make an audio disk from mp3?  i just updated to dapper and it states:  the plugin to handle audio/mpeg is not installed but it plays fine on xmms
install gstreamer0.10-plugins-ugly
thanks crimsun_ :)
i install that package and i get the same error
with what app?
gnomebaker
gnomebaker needs the older gstreamer0.8-mad
oh...i have k3b too
what app would you recommend to do it?
and k3b would need libk3b2-mp3
I normally use Serpentine.
should be installed by default in Applications> Sound & Video>
yep, and it appears to work
i have nero linux, k3b, and gnomebaker
couldnt get any of them to work :)
none of them work after installing the aforementioned packages?
serpentine works
did you install gstreamer0.8-mad and libk3b2-mp3?
installing those two additional packages should allow you to burn mp3s "directly" in both gnomebaker and k3b
cool thanks itraries? works :)  how do you keep track of all those lib
developers should know "something"
cool thanks it works :)  how do you keep track of all those lib
i guess so :)
my roomate is very thankful, she give you a kiss...thanks for being a developer!
